Congratulations !!
He will either enroll at a private school or be home schooled.
data.name: Ahmed Mohamed’s Dad Says He Won’t Return to Public School
data.description: Teenager will transfer after his arrest for bringing a clock to school

data.message: I hope he can find a strong science oriented private school. We need young people like him to have opportunities. Too many smart kids are being lost because of racial differences and bullying.
If they thought it was a bomb, why didn't they evacuate the school and bring in the bomb squad?

Hey guys, I attend MacArthur High School and was a friend of Ahmed. He's been collecting technology that's been thrown out since the 7th grade. He went on to create his own little projects, like a radio in which he made from scraps in the 8th grade and showed to most of us. Our teacher (The one who took up the clock) is very... Uneducated about what a bomb looks like. I will say that I am ashamed of the staff here, but not of the students around me, as we're all bright and talented in our own way, and I can confirm that there's quite a few Ahmeds here... I would also like to clarify that we're not a racist white trash school, we're mainly Hispanics and Blacks with a pinch of every other race. Thankfully, Ahmed was never bullied, nor was he ever targeted by anyone in the 4 years I've known him. Our English teacher overreacted and so did our principal. Ahmed has moved to a very high ended school, and we are all happy he did (The freshmen students).

UPDATE: Everyone seems to mistaken my "White Trash" part of the comment. To clarify, I've seen so many comments and posts from people who don't know our school label us "White Trash".

UPDATE 2: Teacher has been gone since Wednesday. Most likely administrative leave. The talk about Ahmed has been surprisingly low, and I figured out why when a friend and I was talking about the subject. Our teacher had interrupted us and threatened that she'd send us to the principal who is heavily involved in the incident, not the principal we are assigned to. Pretty funny actually. So no one has really spoken about Ahmed until after school where they have a mini Ahmed gathering (About 12 kids).
Private school is far better than home schooling

If a nerdy white kid said he hated everyone at his school and his friends is saying he is thinking about bringing a gun to school, nobody panics... but if a kid named Ahmed Mohamed brings a clock to school then everyone loses there minds!

Irony.... Such kids should be in public school so as to inspire his contemporaries. We as kids have drawn inspirations from friends and teachers alike . But now he has to go to home schooling for an unfortunate reason.
I'm glad people are seeing how stupid Public school is in America. Looks like Private schools will be lining up to recruit him.
Patients should sue public school and the school district and make them pay for it in full.
White American enters a school with guns , starts shooting: mentally disturbed   Brown Muslim American enters school brings a clock to school , a terrorist,,,,... 😞😭😠😡
wise decision
They handled this whole situation ridiculously.Furthermore, it is a shame that the public school system will not benefit from this young mans intellect.

Not all public schools are bad, though it depends on which school district you live in. However, an above average child should be offered an above average education, and this child would definitely thrive in a college prep school environment...one that doesn't assume you're a terrorist because you're a Muslim.
Hell get a scholarship to a private school. They will want the science kid who went to the white house
This child shod be in a public school. Maybe not in Texas.
He should set up a go fund me site and let the people send them money to help with tuition.
Catholic schools in New York City have a number of Muslim students we would be happy to have him attends one of our High Schools. Texas needs to come into the 21 century.

Good for his dad! The trauma alone of being arrested, let alone having to go back to a school where you were viewed you as a suspected terrorist, is not the place this chilld should be. They are still ignoranlty defending the indefensible when the correct thing to do would be to apologize to this child and his family for school official's improper handling of this situation. Additionally, the police department should be held accountable for their actions as well arresting a teenager without probable cause and looking quite incompetent afterwards.Texas...smh

This kid seems to be far above what public school will provide to him, considering his teacher can't tell the difference between a clock and a bomb. He's better off with people who will embrace his intelligence instead of condemn him for it. We need more kids like this in our future.
Private school is better than public school...
Any school should be proud to have Ahmed as a student.
Public school is the worst.

I agree with Ahmed's dad! This was nothing short of profiling. If the School staff felt like they were in real danger, they would have evacuated the whole school, and the bomb squad would have been there. None of that happened. Why? Because their line of thinking was it's a Muslim child, trying to test if it was easy to bring explosives into the school, and the clock was only a test. They saw there was no explosives on the clock. They treated him like a criminal because he and his family are Muslim. Period.
Only terrorist brings clock to school
He will be accepted to private school and the school board will pay for it because they failed him its called education is a right not a privilage

Seriously. Why the news keep talking about this? Who cares? What the school did was the right thing to do. It has nothing to do with the kid being muslim, it was for security reasons, better be safe than sorry. This is ridiculous.

These two quotes have been life changing for me. I can't stop thinking about them:
"Because of the Atonement, we can learn from our experiences without being condemned by them."
"Loving 'God with all [our] might' means loving to the extent of our own unique personal capacity, not to the extent of some abstract and unreachable scale of perfection."

data.message: Instead of feeding the poor... Let's spend money building none sense stuff. Bravo Catholic Church - Pope Francis would be disgusted.
Are there scale models of priests molesting children?
That's St Peter's ..in the Vatican.
Legos are cool! Don't care much for the church or the pope, though.

The creepy priests are prob trying to attract small children.....to rape.  (Then when they get caught they can just shuffle the rapist priests to South America as they have been doing.
http://www.usatoday.com/story/news/world/2015/09/17/us-priests-sex-abuse-relocate-south-america/32551455/
Never see all these negative comments on any other post about a model made of Lego. Just because its made by a Priest and its something Catholic lets just bring on the hate
The Pope will be impressed by building blocks made by Lutherans
Could have invested the money spent in homeless feeding.. Legos are pricey. 😑
The pope is not my father,for my Father resides in Heaven.
I guess priest would rather play with children toys then doing the work of our lord
I think the pope would be bored he already lives there
"St. Catherine of Siena church in Moscow, Pennsylvania,  (about 100 miles north of Philly)" i.e. about 10 miles east of Scranton.
That's one way to impress the pope. Hahaha
A priest with some mad Lego skills! Love it!
A super artcraft...but think the Pope would like anything less...material.
That is scary. Will the Vatican be available as one of the new Dimensions as well? Shall all religions?

Vatican holds enough wealth to end world hunger many times over, preaches to poor people about feeding poorer people from a golden throne.
Charity...you're doing it wrong.
Good to see church money go into good use... And that priests have that much free time on their hands
Priest Lego Masterbuilder. Amazing. 💥
The Sistine Chapel. The Vatican is much larger and has a few parks
That is the absolute best and most effective way a priest could have possibly used ten months of his time.
I guess if you have no sex life anything is possible lol
I don't know why this dislike comment, it's priceless work, very neat and talented...
I'm sure it attracts many young boys also.
No choir boys were harmed in the making of this building. (Maybe)

data.name: STUFF

data.message: YEAH !!!
$4,000 - That's a huge pile of bud! I think I'd rather have the bud than the death's sticks....
i need to quit but its soo hard especially when my life is so hectic
I finally managed to quit cigarettes July 5 '06 after many many attempts. One of THE BEST thing I have ever done for myself!
I have also heard that a lot of people who didnt have cancer before they quit, get it later, however my dad quit a long time ago and he is 87
every cigarette i smoke is doing other people good. keeps me from going ape on them.
Thank you Jack for this important post , bless u!
^^I know I should quit, but I have to agree ^^

I quit six years ago, good to see this chart, quitting was not hard, you just have to do something instead of putting a cigarette in your mouth. I used sugar free sour candies,  haven't picked up a cig since!
not so true, my grandpa died 10 years after he stoped, sometimes abruptly stopping is the worts thing yiou can doo
Cigerette free 2 1/2 yrs Always a smoker with nature!
Also it took me 7yrs to quit!

most folks that quit after smoking for years i would say 8 out of 10 have more helth issues after quiting I think its funny everyone points to smoking as a cancer issue but we say nothing about all the add. thye put in foods that the fda will not release info on.........I will never quit smoking I will enjoy my life while im here an live every min to the fullest
um 4000 $$$ ????? bullshit thats like 12 bucks a day mine are 4
Ain't nobody's business
Smoking is for losers!
Unless its weed
i really do need to quit
Thanks bud
He's school aged in Kansas, that means he's educated in 1984.  Be nice to him.
I've seen many people overcome nicotine addiction. It's amazing to watch!  Cancer, BTW, is caused by more than having smoked.  Other toxins build up in our bodies besides the ones in cigarettes.

quitting smoking is easy, I did it hundreds of times!  But I finally did quit for good.  It was so worth it, don't give up Cheryl. For me the most convincing thing was the reduction of facial wrinkles.  And the fact that my boyfriend couldn't stand the smell of cigarette smoke.
i had to quit when they became tooooo expensive:  $.72 per pk, $4.99 a carton!!!  i was smoking 1.5 pks per day!  i quit in 1980!!!
The cancer thing is kinda luck of the draw. Family history also play big into the cancer.
Quit 4/17/97 and never looked back. SO HAPPY!

data.message: Whaaaat!?
A supersonic classic, back from the dead.
data.name: Concorde may fly again by the end of the decade
data.description: Concorde, one of only two commercial supersonic jets ever created, may take to the skies again if an ambitious and dedicated crew of enthusiasts is successful in bringing it back from the dead....

data.message: The was only one thing to blame for the Concorde crash.....THE FRENCH.

We have efficient super-cruise engine technologies and super strong & lighter composite aerospace vehicles. The unfortunate last crash of the 1950's tech supersonic Concorde was a marketing disaster for the next gen supersonic flight. It is very viable and marketable today.
Maybe until 2019 we could actually see a Concorde plane on ground.
I feel good from the inside. Never seen one, though.
I witnessed the last one land in Heathrow.

It got scrapped thanks to another aircraft shedding parts. 

They fixed the potential fire hazard with Kevlar sheets and Branson offered to take over the planes.....

Yeah it was still ready to fly. 

As old as it was it was still the leader in sst
Very good welcome back !! Like that i will be UK soon.  2 :30 flight , cool
Just remember, it might need it's fuel tank design revisited. http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/europe/france/7778309/Father-of-Concorde-to-blame-for-2000-Paris-crash.html

The British Concorde planes were sold to British Airways by the government for £1. When they decided to retire the fleet Richard Branson wanted to buy one or more of them to continue flying it as part of Virgin Atlantic but they refused to sell it. They didn't want the competition or the loss of face. So because of BA's stubbornness they were scrapped. Terrible.

I have a fabulous picture I took of the Concorde during the EAA in Oshkosh WI from years back (probably in the late 80's or earliy 90"s not sure of the year anymore :( ) A very impressive aircraft but too expensive for me to fly on. The front of the nose tilts downwards as it desends. Way too cool.
Been in it 3 times. Once on BA007, the one in New York, and twice on the one in Barbados - which we were told is started every September to check it through in case it's needed for an air show.
If it comes out of retirement I suppose The Smithsonian would have to remove it from the Air & Space Museum? #smithsonian #airandspace
Till how many crashes...
Woooohooooo!!!!! That's amazing news. I can't wait to get the experience of being flown in a Concorde.
The Concorde was a gas guzzler. That is one of the reasons it was decommissioned. It burned 2 tons of fuel just taxiing on the runway.

As a Concorde and aviation fan, I say "yaaaaaaay!".

As a college student, I say "why I'm so freakin poor"
The most beautiful airplane ever made :)
make it hybrid electric

Who's going to maintain it? It seems unlikely that Airbus would do it, so I don't see this happening.

She was a beautiful plane, but they'd be better off investing the money into the Concorde Mark 2 program.
Good Luck I was at the anniversary last autumn at Brooksfield 10 years since BAW002 KJFK-EGLL landed last time
With all the technology that are out today, there is no reason that this beautiful beast can't make a resurrection.

Comprises. Comprising. Comprised 
Never comprised OF
wasn't the Concorde just about the least fuel efficient carrier ever and an elitist tool to boot. I say no, no, no...I don't want to see it rehabbed!

No, what they need to do is build a new and improved one that's faster and even more fuel efficient maybe even run on and alternative fuel source. Instead of bringing back that over price gas guzzling playing back from the dead
This would be a dream come true!
The project could be worth $5 billion.
data.name: China wants to build a high-speed train connecting Los Angeles to Las Vegas

data.message: Los Santos to Las Venturas you mean?
What about if AMERICA builds a high-speed train from LA to LV!
I don't trust "made in China" bullet train.
Chinese built our first trains...as slaves. Kinda ironic.
Not worth it. From LA to NYC I say it is...but LA to Las Vegas is only a 4 hrs drive.
It won't actually be LA to Vegas - it's slated for Victorville to Vegas, with a (tenuous) connection to the planned high speed north-south train.....if that ever gets built.
China???? Wtf.... And here the citizens can't put up a limoneade stand because of code ordinance.... Yet a country against the US can come and build??
I took a Vegas to LA flight in may that had enough Chinese tourist to fill a train. Makes sense to me lol
Half the Vegas fun is the road trip. We don't need a train. Spend it on education or to better our highways.
Dont worry American, China is building a high speed train for Vietnam and it is pretty ok except a lot of accidents during construction and low quality.
Anything "Made in China" that does 230mph sounds like a GREAT IDEA!
This makes much more sense then the $100 billion dollar bullet train from bakersfield to modesto.
China is building a high speed train for VietNam and right now its have a lot of accidents while building and low quality. Get far away from china'technology....:)
Build one yourselves, taking advice from Europe. China does not have a good track record of high-speed trains. https://www.youtube.com/watch?t=2&v=nyiUCra6rxo
Yeah there is a condition though, that only Chinese people will use the train.
Japanese should build to train there's goes 280 Miles an hour ..China's 100 lame
Screw the train idea, build the Elon Musk Hyperloop !!!
Why can't America build our own high-speed train?
Hola soy hija de jose de tampico soy nora kimberly no estiendo el ingles
Then I am not getting on that train. That should be an American project!
Keith Sjursen DeMonte I'll get a job in Vegas lol.  Or go live there since it's cheaper and then just come hang in LA
There'd be some debauchery going on in that train lol
I am sure La Vegas can not wait.

why not.  We have Spanish run toll road 1/4 mile from our house.  Its nice to use every now and then.   Not sure why they picked LA to LV to start.   Seems like the western coast could support multiple high speed trains.   San Diego to LA.
This doesn't make any sense. Why would China do this? And not the U.S. when it's their own country?

data.story: Tuesday Chrystine Snell shared ATTN:'s video.
data.name: ATTN:
data.description: Next time you hear reefer madness from the 2016 candidates, remember the truth about marijuana.

data.message: Next time you hear reefer madness from the 2016 candidates, remember the truth about marijuana.
Marijuana is a gateway drug. The gateway to saving the planet.
The only victim in my house from marijuana is the fridge
They might not smoke, but, I bet each and everyone of them uses sugar, now there is a gateway drug.
Since Marijuana is supposed to be the "Gateway" drug, does this mean that Jeb is addicted to Heroin now?
A gateway? Yes because cannabis PHYSICALLY makes you snort that line or shoot up. This clown Christie has never smoked a day in his life yet he still continues to trash weed. Sad
If marijuana was a gateway drug and kills productivity, I would be homeless and a crack addict for smoking regularly for the past 12 years.
As far as I can tell Mrs. Fiorina isn't qualified to be president she is unable to tell truth from fiction about marijuana.  What else can't she tell truth from fiction from?

This is coming from the same Chris Christie who doesn't have the self control to shed some weight. Obesity will kill you faster than being addicted to liquor which is way more toxic and has physical addiction potential unlike cannabis, that does not cause addiction (i.e no withdrawals). Abe Lincoln smoked cannabis- productive, Thomas Jefferson- productive, Marley, Dylan, Shakespeare all used cannabis, I think they all did pretty good for themselves.

With New Jersey's economy in the toilet, why is Christie still talking. Made it sound like he saved NJ. Maybe had he allowed the legalization of marijuana we would not have so many poor and homeless people in NJ. I believe the revenue from the sale of marijuana would have alleviated property taxes and a host of other problems in the State. Legal or not it's not going to stop the people that consume it, so why not take in the revenue and everyone wins.
two hours of lie after lie and some of the worst debate performances in recent memory. that field makes a mockery of the concept of democratic leadership. there isn't a true leader in the bunch.
Drop in productivity??? Productivity is at an all time high... i think what he meant to say is that the corporate overlords are high all the time because look at the decline in wages!

I'll have you know. My parents both smoked "marijuana," and they both became successful middle to above class citizens. If marijuana is a gateway to harder more dangerous drugs, then I don't know what success is anymore.
Cannabis is non - addictive. You dumb asses. The only madness is prohibition. Legalize
She is right about one thing, the marijuana people are smoking today is not the same as 40 years ago. Because today we know about all the different strains and flavors. Just like tea

Marijuana makes people use harder drugs just like owning a gun makes you kill people. It's a personal choice what people do, and laws won't stop anything right? That's what you say about guns so why are you saying the opposite with marijuana.

Their are more people dying of overdose by prescriptions drugs today in the US than any other drugs, all of those people talking are waiting for FARMACON lobbyist to make deals with. The drug cartels love this kind of talk  and as long as politicians keep their heads up their ass regarding drugs we won't have any solution in this matter, did u notice that not one of them had a solution, I do, talk to me . By the way not one person has died  of a marijuana overdose ever in fact today's cannabis is curing more people  and stopping people from suffering as results of cancer treatments.

Ask any druggie what was the first drug he/she used and I bet 99℅ of them will say marijuana. Not saying everyone who smokes weed will end up smoking crack, but they always start with weed. So marijuana is a gateway drug.
This is how out of touch Republican candidates are with the truth... and how far into the pockets of big Pharma they are...
Look at all the potheads defending weed here 😂
Reefer Madness runs deep in these candidates!
"Reefer Madness" Lives. (Lol!)
reefer madness all over again
Marijuana is a made up word, it's canabis
I've seen friends beat the fuck out of each other drunk, but I've never seen that happen after a doober. Alcohol is the real gateway drug.
Salute Your Shorts, Secret World of Alex Mac, and Are You Afraid of the Dark? ......I'd spring for cable. Now if PBS brings back Ghost Writer, Wishbone, and American Family I'd be set.
Tv land for Millennials
But does Face come on in the mornings? Don't disappoint me!
Legends of the Hidden Temple and Guts or GTFO!
Does this mean that "Hey Arnold's"  creator will feel compelled to go back and create a proper ending to Helga and Arnold's story?
So a nickelodeon version of Boomerang
Yesss Eurekas Castle!
Omg heaven! Would love it if they brought back all the old shows, Salute Your Shorts, Hey Dude, Double Dare. 90sgasm..
Now if MTV would come out with a channel for 90s-2000s music videos,  my world would be complete
Just Nickelodeon shows? They just need to do 90s T.V. period
Please! I miss Angry Beavers, Kablam, Rocko, Kenan & Kel, All That, Ahhh! Real Monsters!

They did that before in 2004/2005. It was ad-free It was called Nicktoons. Then they absolutely ruined it by adding in original shows. Then taking the old shows off and airing nothing but new spongebob episodes. And added advertisements then dumped us all over on TeenNick few years ago with the 90's are all that midnight block and it's like. Really. Stay up til 12-3 on weeknight a to watch retro shows. Like people don't have class and work in a few hours.
Im worried if they do, theyll try to recreate them eventually and it would totally ruin the original
How about Viacom put out a channel that plays 90s music videos. He'll just a channel that actually plays videos would be nice.
Isn't there already a channel with old school Nickelodeon shows?
First world problem. Caption there is a God because of something so trivial as a tv show.
I hope MTV Channel will also do this!
This had better be an improvement on the crap channel they have now that only airs Rugrats, Hey Arnold, and awful Angry Beavers.  Where are the live action shows?  Bring them ALL back!!
this was my children's go to channel for years.....nostalgia pangs......i still love Nickelodeon!!!!!!!
There is already a channel on direct TV.
My childhood in a channel 😍

There was a website called nick reboot but Nickelodeon told them to shut it down. I'm guessing that's where they got the idea from. I hope they play all the 90s shows. Nick reboot played all the original commercials which was pretty funny to watch
They already have a channel that plays 90s cartoons
I get foxtel just for this channel 90s cartoons were the best.
There's a channel named Toon Cast, it has only old cartoons it's amazing

data.name: What Should I Do When I See Pornography?
data.description: The challenges that children face today related to pornography are tremendous, but armed with the right information about what to do when they encounter it, they can successfully overcome the challenge and lead safe, happy lives.
